verses.verse: Not to us, O Lord, <WH3068> not to us, But to Thy name <WH8034> give <WH5414> glory <WH9202> Because <WH5921> of Thy lovingkindness, <WH2617> because <WH5921> of Thy truth. <WH571>
Why <WH4100> should the nations <WH1471> say, <WH559> "Where, <WH346> now, <WH4994> is their God <WH430>?"
But our God <WH430> is in the heavens; <WH8064> He does <WH6213> whatever <WH3605> <WH834> He pleases. <WH2654>
Their idols <WH6091> are silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> The work <WH4639> of man's hands. <WH3027>
They have mouths, <WH6310> but they cannot <WH3808> speak; <WH1696> They have eyes, <WH5869> but they cannot <WH3808> see; <WH7200>
They have ears, <WH241> but they cannot <WH3808> hear; <WH8085> They have noses, <WH639> but they cannot <WH3808> smell; <WH9552>

They have hands, <WH3027> but they cannot <WH3808> feel; <WH4184> They have feet, <WH7272> but they cannot <WH3808> walk; <WH1980> They cannot <WH3808> make <WH1897> a sound <WH1897> with their throat. <WH1627>
Those who make <WH6213> them will become <WH1961> like <WH3644> them, Everyone <WH3605> who <WH834> trusts <WH982> in them.
O Israel, <WH3478> trust <WH982> in the Lord; <WH3068> He is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
O house <WH1004> of Aaron, <WH175> trust <WH982> in the Lord; <WH3068> He is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
You who fear <WH3372> the Lord, <WH3068> trust <WH982> in the Lord; <WH3068> He is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>

The Lord <WH3068> has been <WH2142> mindful <WH2142> of us; He will bless <WH1288> [us]; He will bless <WH1288> the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478> He will bless <WH1288> the house <WH1004> of Aaron. <WH175>
He will bless <WH1288> those who fear <WH3372> the Lord, <WH3068> The small <WH6996> together <WH5973> with the great. <WH1419>
May the Lord <WH3068> give <WH3254> you increase, <WH3254> You and your children. <WH1121>
May you be blessed <WH1288> of the Lord, <WH3068> Maker <WH6213> of heaven <WH8064> and earth. <WH776>
The heavens <WH8064> are the heavens <WH8064> of the Lord; <WH3068> But the earth <WH776> He has given <WH5414> to the sons <WH1121> of men. <WH120>
The dead <WH4191> do not praise <WH1984> the Lord, <WH3050> Nor <WH3808> [do] any <WH3605> who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> into silence; <WH1745>
But as for us, we will bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3050> From this <WH6258> time <WH6258> forth and forever. <WH5704> <WH5769> Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050>
